class  mlpack::tree::FirstPointIsRoot
 This class is meant to be used as a choice for the policy class RootPointPolicy of the CoverTree class. More...

namespace  mlpack
 

Linear algebra utility functions, generally performed on matrices or vectors.


namespace  mlpack::tree
 

Trees and tree-building procedures.


Detailed Description

Author:
Ryan Curtin

A very simple policy for the cover tree; the first point in the dataset is chosen as the root of the cover tree.
